-- | ByteString-backed Handles
--   
@package bytestring-handle
@version 0.1.0.3

module Data.ByteString.Handle
readHandle :: Bool -> ByteString -> IO Handle
writeHandle :: Bool -> (Handle -> IO a) -> IO (ByteString, a)
